component.name: TriPeaks
component.summary: Dive into the relaxing and strategic world of TriPeaks Solitaire

description.p: Rediscover the joy of TriPeaks Solitaire with a pixel-art style and some enhanced gameplay options.

ul.li: Cards are arranged into three pyramid-like peaks (or choose one of two other layouts).
Match cards that are one rank higher or lower than the current card to clear the board.
Plan your moves, clear streaks, and aim for high scores!
Three Layout Options: Choose between the standard twenty-eight card tableau or two additional layouts for variety.
Customizable Start: Begin with an empty discard pile, allowing you to start with any open card or draw from the stock.
Reveal Face-Down Cards: Enable an option to view the face-down cards for added strategic planning.

description.p: Enjoy a fresh, customizable take on the classic solitaire experience with TriPeaks, the perfect balance of relaxation and challenge.
